summary: 'Aiqing mala tang' ('Spicy Love Soup') starts with a young couple eating sweet (or sour) and spicy soup from a two-sided bowl shaped in a Yin and Yang pattern. Until the couple's wedding at... See full summary »
cast: Xuebing Wang|Chuan Chao|Emil Chau|Yuanyuan Gao|Cunzhuang Ge|Tao Guo|Tsung-Sheng Lee|Bin Li|Liping Lü|Cunxin Pu|Bing Shao|Xingyu Wen|Fan Xu|Jinglei Xu
title: Aiqing mala tang
